system.effect: These Pokemon are blind, but can generally function through increased senses - Blindsense can take the form of echolocation, increased hearing, enhanced sense of smell, a supernatural awareness of the environment, and more. It is, however, unable to distinguish colors or exact forms (reading words on a book would be impossible, for example). Pok√©mon and Trainers with Blindsense can function even in complete darkness, as if they had Darkvision, and they can never be Blinded.
